posts.post_content:
Hello Net54ers,

Thanks for reading my post. I'm in the process of trying to put together a mid grade subject back run of Big Ed Walsh. If you're interested in selling one you'd be willing to part with please let me know.

Also of particular interest to me is a Walsh with an Old Mill or any Sweet Caporal Factory 25 back. A long shot, I know. Nonetheless, for what it's worth!

Thanks!
Eric
